info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 22 at 4:38PM MDT until April 22 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA...SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON...NORTHWESTERN BENNETT AND SOUTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 437 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Kyle North Route Housing, or 34 miles northeast of Pine Ridge, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Satellite and lightning indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kyle, Potato Creek, Interior, Lonesome Valley, Goose Neck Housing, Thunder Valley, Rockyford, Sharps Corner, Kyle North Route Housing, Evergreen, Pinnacles Ranger Station, Snake Butte, eastern Badlands National Park and Pine Ridge Reservation. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
